text: Juna janavarama allahako nama li'inna tyasala'i nakha'u kina bhane nihsandeha tyo ajnako ullanghana ho. Ra saitanaharule (yastakuraharu) aphna sathiharuko hrdayama halidinchan, jasakokarana tiniharule timisanga jhagada garun. Yadi timi tiniharule bhane anusara hindyau bhane niscaya nai timi pani musrika nai hunachau
